code: import{canMove}from'./canMove';export var stalemate=function stalemate(board,turn){var tempTurn='White';if(turn==='White'){tempTurn='Black';}var pieceCount=0;/*checks to see if kings are only pieces left*/for(var i=0;i<=7;i++){for(var j=0;j<=7;j++){if(board[i][j]!==' '){pieceCount++;}}}if(pieceCount===2){return true;}/*will search through and see if any piece can make a move that gets out of check*/for(var _i=0;_i<=7;_i++){for(var _j=0;_j<=7;_j++){if(board[_i][_j]!==' '&&board[_i][_j][0]!==turn[0]){for(var k=0;k<=7;k++){for(var m=0;m<=7;m++){if(canMove(board,_i,_j,k,m,tempTurn,false,[[,[,]],[,[,]]])){return false;}}}}}}return true;};
